# [Bug Report][3.6.8] VTreeview slow performance on expand

### Environment
**Vuetify Version:** 3.6.8
**Vue Version:** 3.4.27
**Browsers:** Chrome 125.0.0.0
**OS:** Mac OS 10.15.7

### Steps to reproduce
1. Load reproduction link
2. Expand a node

### Expected Behavior
Should be as fast as using VList: 
https://play.vuetifyjs.com/#

### Actual Behavior
Slow and frozen

### Reproduction Link
[https://play.vuetifyjs.com/#...](https://play.vuetifyjs.com/#...
